</style></head><body><script data-testid="js-feature-detector">if("undefined"!=typeof window&&"undefined"!=typeof document){const e=document.documentElement;e.classList.add("js"),e.classList.remove("no-js")}</script><script>
var shouldShowBanner = false;
if(document.cookie.indexOf('OptanonAlertBoxClosed') === -1){
  shouldShowBanner = true;
} else {
  var cookieString = document.cookie;
  var i = document.cookie.indexOf('OptanonAlertBoxClosed') + ('OptanonAlertBoxClosed=').length;
  var dateString = '';

  while(cookieString[i] && cookieString[i] !== ';') {
    dateString += cookieString[i];
    i++;
  }

  // check if reconsent needed because of onetrust list update
  if(new Date('2022/06/14, 16:51') > new Date(dateString)) {
    shouldShowBanner = true;
  }
}

// user accepted cookie but left the page before onetrust was called
try {
  if(localStorage.getItem('CustomCookieBannerAcceptIntent')) {
    shouldShowBanner = false;
  }
} catch (err) {
  console.warn('Localstorage was not accessible');
}


if(shouldShowBanner) {
  document.documentElement.classList.add('show-cookie-banner');
}
</script><script>
function setGlobalAttributionId() {
  const attributionIdFromQueryString = new URLSearchParams(
    window.location.search
  ).get('tid');

  const attributionIdFromState = window.history.state?.tid
  
  const referrer = document.referrer

  if (attributionIdFromState) {
    window.tid = attributionIdFromState;
  } else if (
    attributionIdFromQueryString &&
    (referrer.includes("typeform.com") ||
      referrer.includes("localhost"))
  ) {
    window.tid = attributionIdFromQueryString;
  }

  if (attributionIdFromQueryString) {
    const urlObj = new URL(window.location.href);
    urlObj.searchParams.delete('tid');

    const urlWithoutAttributionId = urlObj.toString();

    window.history.replaceState(
      {
        ...window.history.state,
        tid: window.tid,
      },
      "",
      urlWithoutAttributionId
    );
  }
}

setGlobalAttributionId();
</script><div id="__next"><style>

</style><div class="cookie-consent-area"><div class="cookie-consent-banner" role="alertdialog" aria-describedby="cookie-consent"><div class="cookie-consent-banner-content"><div><h3 id="cookie-consent-title">Cookie consent</h3><p class="cookie-consent-text">We use our own and third-party cookies to show you more relevant content based on your browsing and navigation history. Please accept or manage your cookie settings below. Here&#x27;s our<!-- --> <a href="https://admin.typeform.com/to/dwk6gt/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">cookie policy</a></p></div><div class="cookie-buttons"><button class="cookie-accept-btn">Accept all cookies</button><button class="cookie-settings-link">Cookie settings</button></div></div><div data-testid="cookie-consent-banner-boundaries" class="cookie-consent-banner-boundaries"></div></div></div><script>
  var settingsClicked = false;
  var isFirstCallbackCall = true;
  var oneTrustCookiesRejectedEvent = new Event('oneTrustCookiesRejected');

  var callSdk = function(callback) {
    if (!document.querySelector('#onetrust-consent-sdk')) {
      setTimeout(function() {
        callSdk(callback)
      }, 100)
    } else {
      callback()
    }
  }

  function hideBanner() {
    var shownBanner = document.querySelector('.show-cookie-banner');

    if(shownBanner) {
      shownBanner.classList.remove('show-cookie-banner')
    }
  }

  function onRejectAllCookies() {
    window.dispatchEvent(oneTrustCookiesRejectedEvent)
  }

  function onShowSettings() {
    settingsClicked = true;

    callSdk(function sdkSettingsCallback() {
      window.OneTrust.ToggleInfoDisplay()

      var rejectAllButton = document.querySelector('.ot-pc-refuse-all-handler');

      if (rejectAllButton) {
        rejectAllButton.addEventListener('click', onRejectAllCookies)
      }

      settingsClicked = false;
    })
  }

  function onAllowAllCookies() {
    try {
      localStorage.setItem('CustomCookieBannerAcceptIntent', true)
    } catch(err) {
      console.warn('Localstorage is not accessible');
    }

    hideBanner();

    callSdk(function sdkAllowCallback() {
      window.OneTrust.AllowAll();
      window.OneTrust.TriggerGoogleAnalyticsEvent('Inhouse Cookie Consent', 'Banner Accept Cookies');

      try {
        localStorage.removeItem('CustomCookieBannerAcceptIntent')
      } catch(err) {
        console.warn('Localstorage is not accessible');
      }
    });
  }

  window.OptanonWrapper = function OptanonWrapper() {
    if (isFirstCallbackCall) {
      isFirstCallbackCall = false;
      return;
    }

    if (!settingsClicked) {
      hideBanner();
    }
  }

  function attachCookieConsentListeners() {
    document.querySelector('.cookie-settings-link').addEventListener('click', onShowSettings);
    document.querySelector('.cookie-accept-btn').addEventListener('click', onAllowAllCookies);
  }

  try {
    if(localStorage.getItem('CustomCookieBannerAcceptIntent')) {
      onAllowAllCookies();
    }
  } catch(err) {
    console.warn('Localstorage is not accessible');
  }

  callSdk(function setLanguage() {
    window?.OneTrust?.changeLanguage?.('en')
  })
  attachCookieConsentListeners();
</script><div style="visibility:hidden;position:fixed;top:0;pointer-events:none"><a href="/signup/">Signup</a></div><div data-qa="navigation" data-testid="mega-menu" class="sc-44fcd803-0 jWpKxO"><div <!-- -->of forms</p></div></h1><div data-qa="headline-description" data-testid="headline-module--description" class="sc-96206ce0-0 sc-7aafbe90-0 iDdmDi gPeGBA sc-e9e4f859-2 jXGpEd"><div class="sc-e9e4f859-3 iExgSn"><p><strong>Our Free Plan lets you:</strong></p>

Up to this limit, you can upgrade your responses/month as much as you want.\n\nIf you need more than 50,000 responses/month, contact our sales team to create a custom plan tailored to your business.","faq.new-pricing.limit-data-collect.new-title":"Is there a limit to the number of responses I can collect?","faq.new-pricing.limit-data-collect.original-title":"Is there a limit to the data I can collect?","faq.new-pricing.what-features-free.content":"You get these features on our free plan:\n\n- Unlimited typeforms\n- 10 questions per typeform\n- 10 responses per month\n- Logic jumps\n- Multiple ending screens\n- Hidden fields\n- Calculator\n- Templates\n- Embed your typeform in a web page\n- Download your data\n- Zapier, Slack, Mailchimp, HubSpot, and other integrations\n\n\nYou can also try features from our paid plans. In that case, your typeform will go into trial mode. You won’t be able to share it and collect responses unless you upgrade to a paid plan (or remove the trial features).","faq.new-pricing.what-features-free.original-title":"What features can I use for free? ","faq.new-pricing.know-how-code.original-title":"Do I need to know how to code?","faq.new-pricing.limit-data-collect.content":"Each plan comes with a number of responses/month included, and has its own maximum monthly response limit. Up to this limit, you can upgrade your responses/month as much as you want.\n\nIf you need more than 50,000 responses/month, contact our sales team to create a custom plan tailored to your business.","faq.new-pricing.limit-data-collect.new-title":"Is there a limit to the number of responses I can collect?","faq.new-pricing.limit-data-collect.original-title":"Is there a limit to the data I can collect?","faq.new-pricing.what-features-free.content":"You get these features on our free plan:\n\n- Unlimited typeforms\n- 10 questions per typeform\n- 10 responses per month\n- Logic jumps\n- Multiple ending screens\n- Hidden fields\n- Calculator\n- Templates\n- Embed your typeform in a web page\n- Download your data\n- Zapier, Slack, Mailchimp, HubSpot, and other integrations\n\n\nYou can also try features from our paid plans. In that case, your typeform will go into trial mode. You won’t be able to share it and collect responses unless you upgrade to a paid plan (or remove the trial features).","faq.new-pricing.what-features-free.original-title":"What features can I use for free?
